00038 class KVIRC_API KviKvsScriptAddon : public KviHeapObject
00039 {
00040         friend class KviKvsScriptAddonManager;
00041 protected:
00042         KviKvsScriptAddon();
00043         KviKvsScriptAddon(
00044                         const QString &szName,
00045                         const QString &szVersion,
00046                         const QString &szVisibleNameCode,
00047                         const QString &szDescriptionCode,
00048                         const QString &szUninstallCallbackCode,
00049                         const QString &szIconId
00050                 );
00051 public:
00052         KviKvsScriptAddon(const KviKvsScriptAddon &a);
00053 public: // KviDict wants that... how to restrict the deletion to KviKvsScriptAddonManager only ?
00054         ~KviKvsScriptAddon();
00055 protected:
00056         QString        m_szName;              // the short name of the addon
00057         QString        m_szVersion;           // x.y.z
00058         KviKvsScript * m_pVisibleNameScript;  // the visible name, possibly translated
00059         KviKvsScript * m_pDescriptionScript;  // the description, possibly translated
00060         KviKvsScript * m_pUninstallCallback;  // uninstall callback
00061         KviKvsScript * m_pConfigureCallback;  // configure callback
00062         KviKvsScript * m_pHelpCallback;       // help callback
00063         QString        m_szDescription;       // parsed description
00064         QString        m_szVisibleName;       // parsed visible name
00065         QString        m_szIconId;
00066 public:
00067         const QString &name() const { return m_szName; };
00068         const QString &version() const { return m_szVersion; };
00069         const QString &visibleName();
00070         const QString &description();
00071         const QString &visibleNameCode();
00072         const QString &descriptionCode();
00073         const QString &uninstallCallbackCode();
00074         const QString &configureCallbackCode();
00075         const QString &helpCallbackCode();
00076         const QString &iconId(){ return m_szIconId; };
00077         QPixmap * icon();
00078         void setConfigureCallback(const QString &szConfigureCallbackCode);
00079         void setHelpCallback(const QString &szHelpCallbackCode);
00080         void executeConfigureCallback(KviWindow * pWnd);
00081         void executeHelpCallback(KviWindow * pWnd);
00082 protected:
00083         bool load(KviConfig * cfg,const QString &szName);
00084         void save(KviConfig * cfg);
00085         void executeUninstallCallback(KviWindow * pWnd);
00086         // this assumes that the script pointers are clean (i.e. not needing to be freed!)
00087         void allocateScripts(const QString &sVisibleNameCode,const QString &szDescriptionCode,const QString &szUninstallCallbackCode);
00088 };
00089 
00090 class KVIRC_API KviKvsScriptAddonRegistrationData
00091 {
00092 public:
00093         QString szName;                      // the addon name
00094         QString szVersion;                   // the addon version in form x.y.z
00095         QString szVisibleNameScript;         // the code that evaluates to the visible name, possibly translated
00096         QString szDescriptionScript;         // the code that evaluates to the description, possibly translated
00097         QString szUninstallCallbackScript;   // the uninstall callback code, will be executed at uninstallation
00098         QString szIconId;                    // the icon identifier (scaled to 32x32 atm)
00099 };

00102 {

00110         bool                               m_bLoaded;     // have we loaded stuff from disk yet ?
00111         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviKvsScriptAddon>         * m_pAddonDict;  // all the registered addons
00112 public:
00113         static KviKvsScriptAddonManager * instance(){ return m_pInstance; };
